name: Using stroke dash for pixel-perfect intervals
description:
Need to make a dashboard meter? Or a clock? An odometer or compass? This file might help!


This trick uses the dash/gap length to calculate exact degree marks. This lightweight approach makes it easy to store all of the information for interval marks in a single stroke.


Note: Due to the dash/gap logic, this only works for intervals divisible by 2. For example, 5 intervals (marks at 72°) will render as 4 intervals.


Give some ♥ if you enjoy it!
